articles.title: Mortgage Bonds Pose Big Questions for the Fed as It Starts Paring Its Balance Sheet. Here’s Why. - Barron's
articles.description: The Fed gave more details on its balance-sheet shrinkage plans than many strategists expected. But are there still more questions than answers, Lisa Beilfuss writes, with investors and policy makers together in the dark.
articles.content: The Federal Reserve is about to start shrinking its massive balance sheet. Officials say the process will run in the background, but it probably wont. Investors should brace for an extended period of… [+332 chars]
